EmailTemplate.subject: Claiming your expenses - NCS expense form for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We hope you're ready to start your wave on the NCS programme! This email contains information on how to claim back money for any valid expenses you incur whilst you're working with us on wave {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
What expense claims can I submit?
Seasonal staff members can only make expense claims for travel costs incurred during your work placement - not your travel to- and from your home to the NCS programme venues.
We occasionally cover other expenses in exceptional circumstances - these claims are authorised on a case-by-case basis. Please ensure you discuss your claim with your Programmes team before submitting it online.
How do I submit an expense claim?
Click on the link below to access the expense form for wave {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=hl8kxfyebuyp&q1={!Job_Application__c.Id}&q2={!Job_placement__c.Id}
Please read the instructions on the form carefully - claims submitted incorrectly will not be processed. You can re-use this expense form as many times as you need to submit your claims for this wave.
What do I need to know?
- All of your summer expenses must be submitted by 15th September 2016
- Make sure that you attach clear scanned or photograhped copies of all relevant receipts/tickets, and keep the original copies until your expenses are reviewed. Paper receipts handed in or posted will not be processed.
- This expense form is only valid for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c} and is specific to you and your job placement on this wave. Please don't send this link to other seasonal staff!
- Each expense claim is subject to approval by your programmes team.
- Your programmes team will review all expense claims at the end of each wave.Try to submit your expense form within 3-4 days of your role ending.
- Expenses will be processed on a fortnightly basis thereafter.
- We aim to pay all expenses within two weeks of authorisation. We'll email you to let you know when your claims have been processed.
Working on multiple waves this summer?
This expense form is only valid for cost incurred on {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}. We will provide you will a new expense form for each wave or work placement you are 'confirmed' for. Please make sure you use the corresponding form for whichever wave you are submitted expenses for.
Any questions?
If you have any queries about The Challenge's expenses policy, or regarding any existing expense claims you might have, please get in touch with your local staffing team directly.
Best wishes,
The Challenge Staffing Team VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
